Documentation for the code¶

API Reference¶

class MAST.DAG.dagscheduler.DAGScheduler[source]¶

In a session, the maximum number of jobs is MAXJID at once.

addjobs(ingredients_dict, dependency_dict, sid=None)[source]¶

If sid is not specified, then new unique sid will be assigned.

has_complete_session()[source]¶

check all sessions in session table and returns number of complete session

schedule(jobs_file)[source]¶

Parses the input file and applies topological sorting to find the set of jobs in topological order

sort_tasks(dependency_dict)[source]¶

Apply topological sorting to fetch a list, which has sets of tasks that can be scheduled in parallel

update_job_status()[source]¶

udpate session table and update children
